description: This file defines the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter app, which provides a role-based dashboard UI for different user roles (Admin, Manager, Delivery). It includes role selection, role-specific content sections with navigation, and custom UI components, integrating multiple external Dart files and Flutter widgets.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the main home screen with role-based content display.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class for HomeScreen managing UI state, role selection, and content rendering.

classes.name: _ListTile
classes.description: A simple widget for displaying a labeled list item with an icon.

classes.name: _ResponsiveDrawerHeader
classes.description: Widget for displaying user role information in the drawer header.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main widget tree for the HomeScreen, including app bar, role selector, content grid/column, and navigation.

methods.name: _buildHeader
methods.description: Creates the header section with title and role pills.

methods.name: _roleGridOrColumn
methods.description: Renders role-specific content sections either as columns (small screens) or wrap grid (larger screens).

methods.name: _buildRoleSelector
methods.description: Builds dropdown widget for selecting user role.

methods.name: _buildRolePills
methods.description: Builds role selection pills for quick role switching.

methods.name: _titleForRole
methods.description: Returns a descriptive title string based on the selected role.

methods.name: _adminOrders
methods.description: UI section for Admin Orders Management actions.

methods.name: _adminMenu
methods.description: UI section for Admin Menu Management actions.

methods.name: _adminUsers
methods.description: UI section for Admin Users Management actions.

methods.name: _managerOrders
methods.description: UI section for Manager Orders Overview actions.

methods.name: _managerLocations
methods.description: UI section for Manager Locations & Time Slots actions.

methods.name: _managerFeedback
methods.description: UI section for Manager Feedback Center actions.

methods.name: _deliveryAssigned
methods.description: UI section for Delivery Assigned Deliveries actions.

methods.name: _deliveryHistory
methods.description: UI section for Delivery History actions.
